channel.title: How can i make it so i can have others download my client?
channel.description: I have my client complete and i want to share it with friends and the web. but i dont want them to have access to the files. (most of the servers you play on now days only have a (start client) button. If i were to give mine the way it is, it has tons of files and 80mb of space. please help me reduce size and make it so files cant be changed.

item.title: How can i make it so i can have others download my client?
item.dc:creator: @ixc21 ixc21
item.description:
@ixc21 wrote:

Im still having difficulties with it. I deleted java files but its still 32 mb big and no run button. i was wonder if you could assist me more or even use teamviewer, i want to get read of the files non neaded and .jar all of it exepct the run so files arent in the way for others. thanx

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make it so i can have others download my client?

item.title: How can i make it so i can have others download my client?
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

copy client 2 Desktop then search java then delete all files then put it in 2 a .rar file upload it 2 watever u use make a vid on youtube with link and BOOM your done hope this helps
